---
title: "Generate Test Report"
output: pdf_document
params: 
  df: ""
  id: ""
---

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

cars <- params$df
car_name <- params$id

```

Report for the species: `r params$id`

```{r}
cars %>%
  filter(car == car_name) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = cyl, y = mpg, fill = cyl)) +
  geom_point()
```
